name: AsyncDNSServer_ESP32_ENC
description: Fully Asynchronous DNS Server Library for ESP32 boards using LwIP ENC28J60 Ethernet. This library is one of the current or future and more advanced Async libraries, such as AsyncWebServer_ESP32_ENC, AsyncHTTPRequest_ESP32_ENC, AsyncHTTPSRequest_ESP32_ENC
keywords: communication, data, async, udp, ntp, time, time-server, server, client, multicast, broadcast, webserver, esp32, esp32-s2, esp32-c3, enc28j60, lwip, udp-server, udp-multicast-server
